discourse_list.title: Starknet changes for executive spell on the week of 2023-01-30

content.content: We are momentarily disabling the L2 teleport gateway to remediate the issue found in the current teleport implementation, explained in Derek’s post. We take this opportunity to take care of a non-urgent task. Due to the Starknet fee mechanism implementation, we had to deploy a new bridge contract and governance relay (see executive spell). In this spell, wee are deauthorizing both the old bridge and the old governance relay. To summarize, three things are being done in this spell:  Disabling the L2 teleport gateway Old bridge deauthorization Old gov relay deauthorization
